name: RTCPeerConnection.peerIdentity
description: The read-only RTCPeerConnection property peerIdentity returns a JavaScript Promise that resolves to an RTCIdentityAssertion which contains a DOMString identifying the remote peer.
content: The read-only RTCPeerConnection property peerIdentity returns a JavaScript Promise that resolves to an RTCIdentityAssertion which contains a DOMString identifying the remote peer. Once this promise resolves successfully, the resulting identity is the target peer identity and cannot change for the duration of the connection.
